item.description:
Host: Claire P. cell @ 603-247-0897



It’s been a while since we have done this, and it was so much fun, so I feel we are overdue to do this again.  So,how about dinner at Dimitrious Restaurant, then we go to the Pinball Wizard Arcade for a fun night playing pinball, air hockey, skeeball, video games or whatever else type of game you want to play? 

I thought it would be fun to pretend we're beachbound without traveling to the coast. It’s too cole for the beach anyway!  The meetup group has been there before and we had a blast! So I thought it was time to do it again.  The place has tons of games available for us to use, all fairly new and in good shape!

If you do not plan on coming, do not RSVP no.

 

For a glance at Dimitrious’ menu go to the web site address below:

http://dimitriousrestaurant.com/index.php?link=dinner

 

For more information about the Pinball Wizard Arcade venue, check out their web site:

www.pinballwizardarcade.com/

 

 

I hope you will join me for a fun evening.

 

 

Please RSVP or call my cell @ 603-247-0897

 

Location: Dimitrious Restaurant  Bridge St, Pelham NH
item.name: Dinner and Pinball Arcade in Pelham NH
